name: Pump Chumps
description:
The Pump Chumps Corporation welcomes you to be a part of one the finest gas station families in the world! 

Do you have what it takes to keep a buzzing establishment up and running while a short-fused boss watches over your every move?

Gameplay

Pump Chumps puts you in the shoes of an ordinary gas station employee trying to make ends meet. The tasks keep piling on and you must try to keep up to the best of your abilities. Failure means you must answer to your boss directly!

Your objective is to survive a whole working week doing various exciting tasks without driving your boss to the brink of a nervous breakdown.

Pump Chumps supports online co-op play so grab a friend and compete for the desired Employee of the Day title!

Features

  • A rich, colourful low-poly gas station environment with a day and night cycle
  • Online multiplayer co-op
  • Charming selection of characters with cool customization! Create a character that defines you!
  • A introductory tutorial sequence with charismatic cutscenes. Get to know your backstory!
  • Plenty of different tasks that keep you busy throughout the day.
  • Ever-increasing difficulty level to keep you on the edge of your seat!
  • Different game modes
    • Five day long work week with increasing difficulty level
    • Endless mode to see how far you can go!
